Name: Space Foes
About the game: A space shooter inspired by old school games. You set the order of the levels, get new weapons and upgrades. Each stage has a boss and a sub-boss with unique skills and challenges. Weapons Get a new weapon every stage defeated. The first levels will be difficult, but when you win you will acquire new weapons to win the next levels. Upgrade System Every enemy you damage the Upgrade bar increases, allowing you to strengthen your ship. Use Upgrade Chips to increase the level of upgrades. Stages A variety of levels with unique difficulties and challenges. From the first to the last level, you define the order.
